author: jchris
msg: make the authentication redirect URL configurable. setting it to the empty string yields the 0.11 behavior

author: bayard
msg: Removing party + jobs. Probably not a good idea to advertise the jobs list as it'll just lead to more spam; and I don't think party is very relevant, people can use community@

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-2855: Added startDelayedSeconds option to quartz component to have the scheduler being started later. Can be used to ensure the scheduler is started after all the routes and whatnot has been initialized.

author: bayard
msg: Fixing link for the community mailing list; it was pointing to announce@

author: bayard
msg: Dropping board@ and members@, both are private lists and have no place on this page. Also dropping some unnecessary text.
